E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1974
Subject: Progress of Bruce Ellingsen
Dear Sir,
Bruce Ellingsen has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an ERA of 1.50 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Masanori Murakami



Date: Monday, 5/19/1974
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Jim French



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1974
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Bob W. Johnson



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1974
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Marcel Lachemann
